Name: Guantanamera
Ingredients: 60 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: “The cocktail I made for Legacy is inspired by the Cuban revolution in the late 1800s. I created a very simple drink that could be made in any bar in the world. You can change some of the bases without losing the integrity of the cocktail. I'm focusing on simplicity, whilst maintaining a full flavor.”
History: Norwegian BACARDÍ Legacy 2014 winning cocktail created by Alex Ruas at Ylajali, Oslo, Norway.
Nutrition: One serving of Guantanamera contains 171 calories
Garnish: Orange zest twist and spray of absinthe
